title: Sankore Madrasa Timbuktu image circa 1300 Q4

content.prompt: The building materials and design features of the structure in the image best illustrate which of the following?

choices.label: Adaptation of religious practices to local traditions
The spread of Mongol culture through conquest and trade
Conflict between Muslim and Christian communities in the Mediterranean
The role of Indian merchant communities in Indian Ocean trade

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
